name: Ottawa Openstreetmap
body:
### Welcome
Welcome to Ottawa Openstreetmap. You'll find our local mapping parties and links you'll find interesting. It's your community, so let us know what you want:)

### Getting Started
[LearnOSM](http://learnosm.org/en/)

### Mapping Parties
Our next mapping party is July 20th @ 9am. Details [here](http://www.meetup.com/openstreetmap-ottawa/events/192567982/).

### This Weeks Challenge
***To be added***

### Interesting Items
[mapillary](http://www.mapillary.com/map)

### Local Tasking Server
***To be added***

### Links
[openstreetmap main site](http://www.openstreetmap.org/)

[openstreetmap wiki](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Main_Page)

[map tags](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_Features)

### Support or Contact
If you have any questions or ideas:) please get in contact with us at either richardburcher at gmail.com or @richardburcher.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
